eu_initiatives:
Acting individually within their own countries, collectively through the five regional groups of IFEH and singularly through IFEH our members strive to influence and contribute to the knowledge and development of environmental health for the benefit of our fellow citizens. 
 
Our main areas of interests are in general as stipulated in our Motto: "Caring for the environment in the interest of world health"  which include: Working towards health equity (Closing the Gap), food safety and integrity, environmental protection and sustainability, occupational health and safety, tobacco control, housing and public health, consumer protection, children's environmental health, and disaster risk reduction.  We are currently promoting a series of International Special Interest Groups in the many areas of environmental health which will enable the development of expert opinion on specific environmental health issues. 
 
We are associated with IMPEL, the World Federation of Public Health Associations and are consultees to Codex Alimentarius.  We are a formal partner with the UNISDR in the area of Disaster Risk Reduction and endorse training in this area through a MoU with the Environmental Health Disaster Management Course lead by Griffith University, Brisbane, Australia. 
 
Our Policy statements can be found on our web page - www.ifeh.org.
